name: Music_994.wav
keywords: ['ska song', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'brass section', 'double bass', 'guitar', 'guitar tron effect', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This ska song features the main melody played on the brass section. This includes saxophone, trumpet and trombones being played in harmony. The bass plays a groovy bassline. The percussion plays a jazz beat with focus on the ride cymbal. A guitar plays chords in the background using a tron or wah effect. This song can be played in a comedy movie.
